text: X&Y; is the third studio album by Coldplay, and was released on 6 June, 2005. == Track listing == # "Square One" # "What If" # "White Shadow" # "Fix You" # "Talk" # "X&Y;" # "Speed of Sound" # "A Message" # "Low" # "The Hardest Part" # "Swallowed in the Sea" # "Twisted Logic" # "Til Kingdom Come [Hidden Track]" Category:Coldplay albums Category:2005 albums
title: X&Y (album)
